name: Rocket Drifter
description:
####[ META INFORMATION ]####

Rocket Drifter was developed in a 12 hour time window for Ludum Dare 50.
- Ludum Dare Page: Here
- Source Code Page: Here

####[ HOW TO PLAY ]####

####[ CONTROLS ]####

W: Move Forwards
S: Move Backwards
A, D: Turn Left or Right

SPACE: Dash Forwards
LEFT_MOUSE: Shoot Bullet

####[ OBJECTIVE ]####

Survive as long as you can while getting the highest score possible.
The score is calculated by multiplying the speed of the enemy killed by your velocity -> the faster you are moving the more points you get.

####[ CREDITS ]####

####[ CONTRIBUTORS ]####
- Everything was made and designed by PolarCube1, except the online leaderboard which was designed by Sebastian Lague.

####[ TOOLS ]####

- Art: Aseprite
- Game Engine: Unity
- IDE: Visual Studio
- Language: C#
- Music: EcrettMusic
- Sound Effects: SFXR
